languages.text: "Очень хорошо, лейтенант. Можете обратиться к Лорд-капитану, тем более что вы, как я вижу, {mf|его|ее} уже отвлекли. Самовольная явка на мостик и перепалка со старшим по званию появятся в вашем личном деле немедленно".

traits.locale_text: "Очень хорошо, лейтенант. Можете обратиться к Лорд-капитану, тем более что вы, как я вижу, {mf|его|ее} уже отвлекли. Самовольная явка на мостик и перепалка со старшим по званию появятся в вашем личном деле немедленно".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Very well, Lieutenant. You may address the Lord Captain, not least because I see you have already seen fit to disturb {mf|him|her}. Your unauthorised appearance on the bridge and display of belligerence toward a higher-ranking officer will be logged on your personal file without delay."
languages.original_text: "Очень хорошо, лейтенант. Можете обратиться к Лорд-капитану, тем более что вы, как я вижу, {mf|его|ее} уже отвлекли. Самовольная явка на мостик и перепалка со старшим по званию появятся в вашем личном деле немедленно".

traits.locale_text: "Very well, Lieutenant. You may address the Lord Captain, not least because I see you have already seen fit to disturb {mf|him|her}. Your unauthorized appearance on the bridge and display of belligerence toward a higher-ranking officer will be logged on your personal file without delay."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Very well, Lieutenant. You may address the Lord Captain, not least because I see you have already seen fit to disturb {mf|him|her}. Your unauthorized appearance on the bridge and display of belligerence toward a higher-ranking officer will be logged on your personal file without delay."

traits.locale_text: "Very well, Lieutenant. You may address the Lord Captain, not least because I see you have already seen fit to disturb {mf|him|her}. Your unauthorized appearance on the bridge and display of belligerence toward a higher-ranking officer will be logged on your personal file without delay."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Very well, Lieutenant. You may address the Lord Captain, not least because I see you have already seen fit to disturb {mf|him|her}. Your unauthorised appearance on the bridge and display of belligerence toward a higher-ranking officer will be logged on your personal file without delay."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “很好，中尉。你现在可以与舰长大人谈话了，因为我看到你已经打扰到了{mf|他|她}。你未经许可出现在舰桥上，还对级别更高的军官表现出了忤逆的态度，这些问题将会立刻记入你的个人档案。”
languages.original_text: "Very well, Lieutenant. You may address the Lord Captain, not least because I see you have already seen fit to disturb {mf|him|her}. Your unauthorised appearance on the bridge and display of belligerence toward a higher-ranking officer will be logged on your personal file without delay."

traits.locale_text: “很好，中尉。你现在可以与舰长大人谈话了，因为我看到你已经打扰到了{mf|他|她}。你未经许可出现在舰桥上，还对级别更高的军官表现出了忤逆的态度，这些问题将会立刻记入你的个人档案。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «De acuerdo, teniente. Puede dirigirse a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, especialmente teniendo en cuenta que ya le ha interrumpido. Su aparición no autorizada y su beligerancia hacia un oficial superior se anotarán en su archivo personal de inmediato».
languages.original_text: "Very well, Lieutenant. You may address the Lord Captain, not least because I see you have already seen fit to disturb {mf|him|her}. Your unauthorised appearance on the bridge and display of belligerence toward a higher-ranking officer will be logged on your personal file without delay."

traits.locale_text: «De acuerdo, teniente. Puede dirigirse a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, especialmente teniendo en cuenta que ya le ha interrumpido. Su aparición no autorizada y su beligerancia hacia un oficial superior se anotarán en su archivo personal de inmediato».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「よろしい、少尉。ロード・キャプテンにお言葉をかけるがよい。陛下の邪魔をするのが、すでにふさわしいと判断したからだ。無許可でブリッジに現れ、上官に対して好戦的な態度を示したことは、遅滞なくお前の個人ファイルに記録しておこう」
languages.original_text: "Very well, Lieutenant. You may address the Lord Captain, not least because I see you have already seen fit to disturb {mf|him|her}. Your unauthorised appearance on the bridge and display of belligerence toward a higher-ranking officer will be logged on your personal file without delay."

traits.locale_text: 「よろしい、少尉。ロード・キャプテンにお言葉をかけるがよい。陛下の邪魔をするのが、すでにふさわしいと判断したからだ。無許可でブリッジに現れ、上官に対して好戦的な態度を示したことは、遅滞なくお前の個人ファイルに記録しておこう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Sehr wohl, Lieutenant. Ihr dürft mit dem Lord Captain sprechen. Nicht zuletzt, weil Ihr es ohnehin schon gewagt habt, {mf|ihn|sie} zu stören. Euer unbefugtes Erscheinen auf der Brücke und Euer aggressives Auftreten einem höherrangigen Offizier gegenüber werden unverzüglich in Eurer Personalakte vermerkt."
languages.original_text: "Very well, Lieutenant. You may address the Lord Captain, not least because I see you have already seen fit to disturb {mf|him|her}. Your unauthorised appearance on the bridge and display of belligerence toward a higher-ranking officer will be logged on your personal file without delay."

traits.locale_text: "Sehr wohl, Lieutenant. Ihr dürft mit dem Lord Captain sprechen. Nicht zuletzt, weil Ihr es ohnehin schon gewagt habt, {mf|ihn|sie} zu stören. Euer unbefugtes Erscheinen auf der Brücke und Euer aggressives Auftreten einem höherrangigen Offizier gegenüber werden unverzüglich in Eurer Personalakte vermerkt."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Très bien, lieutenante. Puisque vous jugez bon de {mf|le|la} déranger pour si peu, libre à vous. Mais j'aime autant vous prévenir que votre insubordination et votre agressivité envers un officier supérieur seront dûment consignées dans votre dossier personnel. »
languages.original_text: "Very well, Lieutenant. You may address the Lord Captain, not least because I see you have already seen fit to disturb {mf|him|her}. Your unauthorised appearance on the bridge and display of belligerence toward a higher-ranking officer will be logged on your personal file without delay."

traits.locale_text: « Très bien, lieutenante. Puisque vous jugez bon de {mf|le|la} déranger pour si peu, libre à vous. Mais j'aime autant vous prévenir que votre insubordination et votre agressivité envers un officier supérieur seront dûment consignées dans votre dossier personnel. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Pekâlâ Teğmen. Gördüğüm kadarıyla kendisini zaten rahatsız etmişsiniz. Köprüye izinsiz gelişiniz ve rütbece üstünüzde olan bir subaya karşı saldırgan tavırlarınız, derhâl sicilinize işlenecektir."
languages.original_text: "Very well, Lieutenant. You may address the Lord Captain, not least because I see you have already seen fit to disturb {mf|him|her}. Your unauthorised appearance on the bridge and display of belligerence toward a higher-ranking officer will be logged on your personal file without delay."

traits.locale_text: "Pekâlâ teğmen. Gördüğüm kadarıyla kendisini zaten rahatsız etmişsiniz. Köprüye izinsiz gelişiniz ve rütbece üstünüzde olan bir subaya karşı saldırgan tavırlarınız, derhâl sicilinize işlenecektir."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
